                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: OS
Platform.............: x64
More Info............:
Image Format.........: Iso and USB
Burn Tested..........: Yes




-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Posted by............: KIRK
Posted on............: 29/10/2014
Fills Policy.........: Wait until after the repost, then ask
Repost Policy........: 1 day after original post
If modified check MD5 with original hash.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FULL UNNATTENDED FROM BOOT TO DESKTOP, script formats Drive 0 ie: your first boot drive to NTFS then installs
without any user input right to the desktop. To Note if Windows 7 is on a drive it will install on the unused drive
and install a Boot Manager. you can use the latest KMSpico 1.0.3 set to auto activate already. thats on the desktop to activate it automatically as well.

Settings changed:

Context Menu added:
Move to, Copy to
Disabled UAC
Show Hidden Files
Unhide known file extensions

Nothing else changed, thats it.
